Package de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.dataaccess.write

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IWrite<T>
    IWrite is responsible for all write actions into the connected datasource.
    IWriteEntry
    For each entity, which was saved by IWrite.save(io.vertx.core.Handler), one instance of IWriteEntry is created and stored inside IWriteResult
    IWriteResult
    This object is created by a save action and contains the information about the action itself and the objects saved
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WriteAction
    When an instance is written, the used action is stored inside IWriteEntry as info
